verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3048>collection<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> I have given <S%G1299>order<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G1053>Galatia,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5210>ye.<s%>

Upon the <S%G2596>first<s%> <S%G3391><s%> day of the <S%G4521>week<s%> let every <S%G1538>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> <S%G1438>him<s%> in <S%G2343>store,<s%> <S%G3748>as<s%> <S%G302><s%> God hath <S%G2137>prospered<s%> him, <S%G2443>that<s%> there <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3048>gatherings<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I <S%G2064>come.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I <S%G3854>come,<s%> <S%G3739>whomsoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> ye shall <S%G1381>approve<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> your <S%G1992>letters,<s%> <S%G5128>them<s%> will I <S%G3992>send<s%> to <S%G667>bring<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5485>liberality<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> it <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G514>meet<s%> that I go <S%G2504>also,<s%> <S%G4198><s%> they shall <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I shall pass <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I do pass <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> it may <S%G5177>be<s%> that I will <S%G3887>abide,<s%> <S%G2228>yea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3914>winter<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> may bring me on my <S%G4311>journey<s%> <S%G3165><s%> <S%G3757>whithersoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> I <S%G4198>go.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> by the <S%G1722>way;<s%> <S%G3938><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> I <S%G1679>trust<s%> to <S%G1961>tarry<s%> a <S%G5100>while<s%> <S%G5550><s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2010>permit.<s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> I will <S%G1961>tarry<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G4005>Pentecost.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1756>effectual<s%> is <S%G455>opened<s%> unto <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there are <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G480>adversaries.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> without <S%G870>fear:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2038>worketh<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> do.

Let <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1848>despise<s%> <S%G846>him:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> conduct him <S%G4311>forth<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I look <S%G1551>for<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G80>brethren.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> As <S%G4012>touching<s%> our <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G625>Apollos,<s%> I <S%G4183>greatly<s%> <S%G3870>desired<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G80>brethren:<s%> <S%G2532>but<s%> his <S%G2307>will<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> not at <S%G3843>all<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> at this <S%G3568>time;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he shall have convenient <S%G2119>time.<s%>
Watch <S%G1127><s%> ye, stand <S%G4739>fast<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> quit you like <S%G407>men,<s%> be <S%G2901>strong.<s%>
Let all your <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G5216><s%> be <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G26>charity.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> ye <S%G1492>(know<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G536>firstfruits<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that they have <S%G5021>addicted<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>saints,)<s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> submit yourselves <S%G5293>unto<s%> <S%G5108>such,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to every <S%G3956>one<s%> that helpeth <S%G4903>with<s%> us, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2872>laboreth.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> I am <S%G5463>glad<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5415>Fortunatus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G883>Achaicus:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> that which was <S%G5303>lacking<s%> on your <S%G5216>part<s%> <S%G3778>they<s%> have <S%G378>supplied.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> they have <S%G373>refreshed<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>yours:<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1921>acknowledge<s%> ye them that are <S%G5108>such.<s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G207>Aquila<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> that is <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G782>Greet<s%> ye one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G5370>kiss.<s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G783>salutation<s%> of me <S%G3972>Paul<s%> with mine <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

If any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G5368>love<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> let him <S%G2277>be<s%> <S%G331>Anathema<s%> <S%G3134>Maranatha.<s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%>
My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G26>love<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
